AfterConstruction

internal use, call it only if you override it in a descendant (Overrides _ButtonsAncestor.T__ButtonAncestor.AfterConstruction .)

Repaint

Called to refresh the button on screen, override it in your descendants or it will crash ! (Overrides _ButtonsAncestor.T__ButtonAncestor.Repaint .)
